headline: Jefferies downgrades Tapestry on valuation after stock run
summary: Investing.com -- Jefferies downgraded Tapestry to Hold from Buy, saying most of the near-term upside is reflected in the stock after a strong rally that has pushed valuations well above historical levels.Stock has gained 31% in last six months. It now trades in the low-20s on a forward P/E basis, compared with a historical average of about 12x and roughly 16x for peers.

headline: L3Harris, Rivian, Tapestry: Top Analyst Calls
summary: Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Brooke DiPalma keeps track of several Wall Street analyst calls on top trending stocks, including calls around shares of L3Harris Technologies (LHX), EV maker Rivian Automotive (RIVN), and Tapestry (TPR). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Here Are Wednesday’s Top Wall Street Analyst Research Calls: AppLovin, Blackrock, Citigroup, DoorDash, Fabrinet, KLA Corp, Okta, Rivian, Uber and More
summary: Pre-Market Stock Futures: Futures are trading lower after the January rally hit a wall on Wednesday, with all major indices falling, and the selling looks set to continue today. The main culprit yesterday was JPMorgan (NYSE: JPM) shares, which took a hit after missing analyst estimates for the quarter. The banking giant posted $4.63 per ... headline: RSPD: Consumer Discretionary Dashboard For January
summary: Consumer services look ~15% undervalued, while autos are overvalued. Here's what investors need to know about consumer discretionary names.
